mapper.select: select pt_no , today , breakfast , to_char(breakfastTime, 'HH24:MI') as breakfastTime , lunch , to_char(lunchTime, 'HH24:MI') as lunchtime , dinner , to_char(dinnerTime, 'HH24:MI') as dinnerTime , snack , snackTime , deleteflag from meal where pt_no = #{pt_no} and to_char(today,'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{today}
select pt_no , today , to_char(exercisetime, 'HH24:MI') as exercisetime , EXERCISETEXT from exercise where pt_no = #{pt_no} and to_char(today,'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{today}
